動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S. S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎。
成分: PER DOSE (0.5 ML)AT LEAST 10^9.0 EID/50 OF NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS (ULSTER 2-C STRAIN)  AND 10^6.7 EID/50 OF INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS (M41  STRAIN),  INACTIVATED AND SUSPENDED IN AN OIL ADJUVANT EMULSION.
